name: Groupees Chat Dark Theme
description: A simple dark theme alternative for Groupees Chat for Firefox. Now also works with Chrome.
additional_info:
This alternative dark style was originally for the old Groupees chat which is still present in bundle chat pages.
An upcoming new chat(beta) is currently in the works which is found in the homepage, new profile(beta), and public trade(beta).
Although it has day and night mode, you can continue using this style for a more uniform look on both chat.
Will update as needed as the new chat(beta) finalize.

Release notes
V1.3.1 - 08 March 2016
-Additional color tweaked to send, emoticon, and volume background area for upcoming new chat(beta).
-Changed emoticon borders from solid to dotted

V1.3 - 29 January 2016
-Minor color tweaked to user-popup for upcoming new chat(beta). Everything else should migrate over alright.

V1.2.1 - 03 July 2015
-Removed default fade/blur effect on chat tabs for Chrome. (Should look similar to screenshot above).

V1.2 - 01 July 2015
-Tweaked color for active chat tab; now in green variant. Default was too subtle.

V1.1 - 13 May 2015
-Updated style for cross-browser compatibility. Should also work with Stylish for Chrome.

V1.0 - 09 May 2015
-Initial Release
